医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型 mRNA 疫苗 GLB-COV2-043 在早期试验中显示出针对 COVID-19 变种的高效功效基于 mRNA 的疫苗的安全性、有效性和免疫原性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Novel-mRNA-vaccine-GLB-COV2-043-shows-high-efficacy-against-COVID-19-variants-in-early-Trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Novel-mRNA-vaccine-GLB-COV2-043-shows-high-efficacy-against-COVID-19-variants-in-early-Trials.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d3b4561-b7a3-481f-bf7a-cbd240c36188 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 07:14:00 -0500 Novel mRNA vaccine GLB-COV2-043 shows high efficacy against COVID-19 variants in early trials
研究 IDO1 和 PDL1：皮肤利什曼病研究中的关键免疫检查点在本次采访中，News Med 与 Nidhi Dey 博士讨论了免疫检查点 IDO1 和 PDL1 以及它们与皮肤利什曼病研究的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Investigating-IDO1-and-PDL1-Key-immune-checkpoints-in-表皮-leishmaniasis-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Investigating-IDO1-and-PDL1-Key-immune-checkpoints-in-表皮-leishmaniasis-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbdf374c-e43d-4f2a-a39e-915bd9641d3b Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:41:00 -0500 Investigating IDO1 and PDL1: Key immune checkpoints in cutaneous leishmaniasis research
深度学习模型可以改善低场 MRI 图像，以实现更好的临床诊断图像到图像转换模型 LoHiResGAN。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Deep-learning-models-can-improve-low-field-MRI-images-for-better-clinical-diagnoses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Deep-learning-models-can-improve-low-field-MRI-images-for-better-clinical-diagnoses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66d1dfa7-45a7-4333-a763-cb21fa806bb0 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:33:00 -0500 Deep learning models can improve low-field MRI images for better clinical diagnoses
许多有色人种担心良好的医疗保健与他们的外表有关一项新的患者调查显示，许多来自种族和族裔群体的人在就诊前做好了接受侮辱和判断的准备，该调查再次证实了美国医疗系统中种族歧视的普遍存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Many-people-of-color-worry-good-health-care-is-tied-to-their-appearance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Many-people-of-color-worry-good-health-care-is-tied-to-their-appearance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fe88371-f4d4-4b93-91e4-4d208d688c26 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:27:38 -0500 Many people of color worry good health care is tied to their appearance
加州雄心勃勃的医疗补助实验在实施中遭遇挫折周二发布的一项调查显示，州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 花费 120 亿美元将加州医疗补助计划转变为该州最弱势居民的社会服务提供者的实验已经进行了近两年，但负责提供新服务的机构并没有有效地做到这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Californiae28099s-ambitious-Medicaid-experiment-gets-tripped-up-in-implementation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Californiae28099s-ambitious-Medicaid-experiment-gets-tripped-up-in-implementation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74c87ef7-2465-4f18-95ee-52127cd9f860 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:25:55 -0500 California’s ambitious Medicaid experiment gets tripped up in implementation
妊娠期高血压疾病与随后的痴呆风险之间的关联研究人员利用队列研究的系统评价和荟萃分析方法，研究了妊娠期高血压疾病 (HDP) 与痴呆风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/The-association- Between-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-and-subsequent-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/The-association- Between-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-and-subsequent-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df3f3494-9527-4bb5-bfa5-0e513d6cafa1 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:14:00 -0500 The association between hypertensive disorders of pregnancy and subsequent risk of dementia
简单的豆类饮食干预显示出显着的益生元作用将罐装海军豆纳入常规饮食八周的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Simple-bean-diet-intervention-demonstrates-significant-prebiotic-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Simple-bean-diet-intervention-demonstrates-significant-prebiotic-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5d281d4-8ac3-45ca-afc2-bed8a75f66d0 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 05:56:00 -0500 Simple bean diet intervention demonstrates significant prebiotic effects
研究人员评估阿尔茨海默病发病机制中可能的线粒体因素一组作者批判性地评估和解释了线粒体功能障碍和代谢变化与阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 发病机制之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Researchers-evaluate-possible-mitochondrial-factors-in-Alzheimers-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Researchers-evaluate-possible-mitochondrial-factors-in-Alzheimers-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79e12c42-c39e-458f-aabf-a6becbf83756 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 05:45:00 -0500 Researchers evaluate possible mitochondrial factors in Alzheimer's pathogenesis
最近的试验表明，光生物调节有望成为帕金森病的安全且可耐受的辅助疗法减少帕金森病运动症状的安全可行的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Photobiomodulation-shows-promise-as-safe-and-tolerable-adjunct-therapy-for-Parkinsons-Disease-recent-trial-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Photobiomodulation-shows-promise-as-safe-and-tolerable-adjunct-therapy-for-Parkinsons-Disease-recent-trial-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d22db51c-a8b6-4d99-815f-81cbfa19ac14 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 05:07:00 -0500 Photobiomodulation shows promise as safe and tolerable adjunct therapy for Parkinson's Disease, recent trial suggests
慢性阻塞性肺疾病的深度学习和机器学习预后模型长期慢性阻塞性肺疾病深度学习和机器学习模型的质量和性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Deep-learning-and-machine-learning-prognostic-models-for-chronic-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Deep-learning-and-machine-learning-prognostic-models-for-chronic-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=458dbdd7-2786-4f32-be6b-ccbb3a0e41ad Tue, 05 Dec 2023 04:34:00 -0500 Deep learning and machine learning prognostic models for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
